title: Tenecteplase (TNK) Dosing for Ischemic Stroke Calculator
desc: Tenecteplase Dosing doses tenecteplase for use in ischemic stroke.

data.evidence:
Tenecteplase dosing is calculated by the following:

Dose, mL = [0.25*(Weight, kg)]/5

Waste, mL = 10 - (Dose, mL)

Note: Total maximum dose is 5 mL (equivalent to 25mg)
